description: Advisory published when the JetStream is enabled for an Account
title: io.nats.jetstream.advisory.v1.enabled

id.description: Unique correlation ID for this event

timestamp.description: The time this event was created in RFC3339 format

server.description: The server this event originates from, either a generated ID or the configured name

server_version.description: The NATS version of the server hosting JetStream

account.description: The account that had JetStream enabled
